1.title: Where were you shrunk?

choices: Let the boy be, he might miss.
112.content:
I awoke, in the cold tundra, shivering in rags. What happened? I thought, This is not home, this is someplace... familiar, yet unknown to me. I hear the hooves of cattle, approaching at an extreme speed. Horses. I look in the distance, I see a large ancient city overlooking the river nearby. Its walls are made of stone. I recognize this place, it's the city of Windhelm. The center of the Rebellion.
I've played Skyrim for years, but never like this. I favored the Stormcloaks, their efforts of fighting back for their homeland is a worthy cause. I felt as those it was job to join their army.

A few weeks later...

It is the battle, the final battle, which took place at the capital of Skyrim. Solitude. Ulfric Stormcloak proudly shouts his speech, one of glory and revenge. Then bloodshed began. I was fighting alongside the Stormcloaks. My pride and strength in every swing of my glass greatsword. I slashed wounds in the Imperials, dismembered many Thalmor, and smashed in the skulls of my enemies. I was the Dragonborn, I fought for what I believed was right.

In order to bring peace to Skyrim, the civil war must end. Running up to the gates, after slaying more Imperials, I spotted a Nord boy, young enough to be a boy, old enough to be mistaken as a man. He was ducking, avoiding the boiling rages of the soldiers. He grabs a pointed rock, sharp enough to stab someone in the chest. He charges at the nearest soldier. Unfortunately, for me, it is a Stormcloak battlemage. I spot a dead Imperial Archer, his bow and iron arrows still intact.
Do I...
112.title: The Beginning of the Battle of Solitude

choices: Shoot the healer, one less healer for the Imperials.
Leave the healer be, they're just doing their job.
Shoot the woman, then the healer can't do anything about it.
1121.content:
I continued fighting; torches, pieces of steel, and arrows all around. There was a big explosion, probably caused by oil and torches, or magic. A few feet away from me I hear a shout. It was a different shout of pain than what the soldiers, with their matured throats, could do. It was a woman's scream of grief.

I turn around, and I see the redguard woman kneeling on the ground, tears in her eyes. I saw a blackened figure in her lap, twitching ever so slightly. It was the boy, burned by a powerful fireball spell. His body twitched, then went as limp as a skeever caught with an arrow, his eyes look straight at me. I've played Skyrim for so long, I knew curses existed. Just then I knew the boy's soul cursed me.

The woman cries loudly, grabbing the attention of the nearby soldiers. This caused an issue within the Stormcloaks, now they're distracted from the battle.

"Oh, by the nine divines, shut the woman up!"

I swing at a few more soldiers to see what's going on. An Imperial healer rushes to the aid of the woman. I look at the still undamaged bow.

122.content:
Serena the Nord vampiress from Dawnguard DLC.

You sided with Dawnguard, which means that you fight against the vampires of Lord Harkon, while you where exploring one dungeon, with Serena as your companion, an enemy vampire come's close to you with a invisible spell on himself, so you didn't noticed him until too late, Lord Harkon gave to him a new poison which causes the victim to shrunk, perfect for kidnapping helpless villagers, then once back in his castle return them to normality, for a prolonged and regular consumption of their blood.

Lord Harkon decided to get the Dragonborn out of the way, with this poison, back in the current situation, the invisible vampire come's too close to you, Serena noticed something wit her more sensible vampire senses and attacked where the enemy was but was too late, he had already stabbed you, your vision becomes blurry, and you pass out.

Some hours later you wake up in a strange and soft surface, when you see around you noticed that everything looks gigantic, that is when you noticed that the soft surface you where, was the palm of you follower Serena.

"Thank Talos, I thought that you where dead, are you ok?" Serena asked you watching you expectantly.

From here you continue the story if you choose Serena option.

Also here is her wiki for an image and some more detailed background: https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Ser...

And finally here another more of my liking modded option of her look: https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/ima...

Brelyna Maryon dark elf or Dunmer as you prefer, she is a mage apprentice in Winterhold college.

One day when you where in the college taking some classes since you where still an apprentice too, one of your fellowship companions in the magic studies come to you, Brelyna Maryon asking you for help in some advanced studies of magic, she wanted your help in a experiment, casting a new spell she just created on you.

You wanting to be the good adventurer you was, and wanting help as much people as possible you accepted to help her.

She lead you to one Midden area, (The Midden is a dungeon under the Winterhold college is mostly an abandoned area, and since is that close to the college I though that the mages could use it for their experiments from time to time), seemed that she had already settled with some tables, chairs, and some magic artifacts.

"Thank you very much for your help once again, please took seat and I will cast the spell on you" Brelyna Maryon said.

"Ok then lets begin" you said siting in the chair, then Brelyna Maryon cast a spell at you, green sparks comes fling to you, everything becomes gigantic around you and you get dizzy from the sudden motion.

"What? you created a shrinking spell, why?" You shouted scared.

"Well in fact this is a side effect my real intention was to create something with a great durability, like this look closely." Brelyna said taking something which looks like a miniature chair from the desk, and putting it in the floor, then she proceeds to stand in her full height, and steps hard on the chair, transforming the chair in nothing else than dust, or so you thought until she took off her foot from the chair, for your surprise it looked perfectly well.

"See the chair is perfectly, I compressed it making it more durable, its hardness increased exponentially since is the same mass in a much smaller space, making it hard as Stalhrim (an ore from Dragonborn DLC the hardest material I think) and since you are the Dragonborn I thought that I can run some tests on you without any issue, what you say can I proceed?" Brelyna asked you with puppy eyes.

"Ok ok but only because, I saw myself that chair is completely fine." You said

Wiki information: https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Bre...

Better Looks: https://i.pinimg.com/originals/23/28/27/...
122.title: Serena and Brelyna Maryon

choices: You accepted her offer back to the sock you go.
You kindly refused, then you sleep in her cleavage.
You refused so she decided to pop you in her mouth.
1221.content:
"Yeah I think so, what happened with the vampire which stabbed me." You asked, rubbing the area on your back where you had been stabbed.

"I killed him, then I took you from the ground and started to heal you, the cut in your back disappeared but you didn't un-shrunk, I come to the dungeon entrance, and waited you to wake up before get out to the wild of Skyrim." Serena said clearly no knowing what to do next.

"I understand, hmm let me think, I don't think I can keep up with you at this size, so I would need you to carry me for the time being, in other hand you would need your hands to fight against the wilderness of Skyrim, you have any ideas? You asked Serena hopefully.

"Well I don't know, I don't want to hurt you, but neither want to loss you, so I need to put you where I can feel you to be sure that you are ok, mmm..." She turned her head down thinking deeply, and saw her well worn boots she was wearing and a idea come to her. "Well you maybe wouldn't like this idea, but maybe I can put you in one of my boots until we reach a city or something, I think there other places." Adjusting her bra a little seductively. "But we don't know each other that well yet." Serena said leaving the possibility to put you in other places in a future.

"Ok if you think is a good idea, but there is another issue I only bought the house in Solitude so far, and we are in a dungeon close to Riften." You said wanting Serena to think in a better place to put you since this gonna be a long trip

"And? I know this gonna be a long trip, but comon, you are the mighty Dragonborn and I will be gentle I promise, also I will heal you with an area spell from time to time to be sure that you are ok, so what do you think you accept that, or we gonna stay here until other adventurers comes? personally I don't care I'm a vampiress and I already waited some centuries in that other dungeon you found me, so I can wait some years here too." Serena said confidently.

You, defeated, accepted that Serena put you in her boot since you had your doubts about being able to wait years to be rescued, as you might have endured that long being the Dragonborn, but you were not so sure about that, so you went with Serena's plan.

Serena crossed her right leg above her left one, grabbed the bottom of her boot with her free hand, and pulled, the boot came out with an audible pop sound, then she took her thick sock off, which comes out slowly since was glued to the skin by a layer of sweat, finally when her toes where freed they wiggled happily for their newfound freedom.

"Well now Bugborn here is where you gonna be during the trip, this way I surely will feel you and know for sure that you are all right, so in you go" Serena said tucking you inside her sock.

"Wait what you called me?, I'm the Dragonborn not the Bugborn" you screamed while falling through the sock.

"Sorry I think that the Bugborn is a better title for the time being, now don't move because here come my foot." Serena said amused with the situation.

Then you saw five digits coming closer to you, they looked excited to play with you, finally they reached you, and grabbed you in a vice, squeezing you trying to figure out if they liked you in there or not, at the end they decided to pass you from toe space, to toe space hugging you in each space, as a welcome for their new roommate, you ended between fourth and pinky toes.

All this time Serena was amused watching a small lump inside her sock, manipulating and playing with it with her toes, after some minutes she calmed a little, and lodged the tiny Bugborn between her fourth and pinky toes.

"Well Bugborn I will put back on my boot now, I will let you take a break when we reach Windhelm ok? Serena asked you with a squeeze.

Not knowing how to respond from the insides of the sock, you simply gave a lick to the pinky toe, which caused that the toes around you gave you a squeeze back.

"Oh that felt great Bugborn thank you, I will take that as a yes, you can do that from time to time during the trip, to thank me for help you, I see you in Windhelm then, so bye Bugborn" Serena said finally putting on her boot and standing up.

She got out of the dungeon, and started her way to Windhelm first her idea was to travel to Windhelm from there to Whiterun, and finally to Solitude where you the Dragonborn had a house where to plan what to do next, and learn how to cure you if possible.

She walked slowly and carefully to step as softly as possible with the foot you where in, in other hand she was enjoying the feeling between her toes wiggling them occasionally, to feel your struggles and licks.

You inside her boot and sock where more or less comfortable, the things you disliked where, the intense pressure, the motion, and the oppressive vinegary aroma, but you noticed the care Serena had while stepping softly on you, the temperature wasn't an issue neither the frozen lands of Skyrim compensated the heat of being inside a boot and thick sock, also the soft skin embracing you was somehow comforting you, so was a passable situation in general.

After a while Serena found some bandits so she started to fight, casting spells to them, and running a little dodging their attacks, wasn't a hard fight since she was a powerful vampiress, and the fellow companion of the Dragonborn, so she ended with them quickly.

For you however it was another story, the ruckus launched you under the big toe and your legs, where trapped under the ball of the foot, so you couldn't move, looked like Serena noticed this since she started to poke you with that toe, but for you more than a poke was a mighty battering on you.

"Since you are there can you rub my toe a little, I will poke you whenever I want little massage ok?" Serena asked waiting a response.

You wasn't so sure, but you licked her toe as before to let her know that you accepted request.

"Thank you Bugborn." Serena said rubbing the tip of her boot on the ground in gratitude.

For you the pressure increased for a moment, you got smashed, while she was "thanking you."

She was close to Windhelm when the sun started to rise up above in the sky, was dawn time, and as a vampiress she preferred to avoid it, so she ran the last bit of the road to town, smashing you more under her toe while you where rubbing it.

Finally she got into the inn, and calmed down, approaching to the reception. "Hello there I want a room please." Serena Asked to the Receptionist.

"Yes of course the price is twenty septims please." Said the receptionist, and Serena just paid quietly. "Thank you very much your room is the last one in the left side."

Serena walked once again stepping softly when stepping on you, when she entered her room she seated in her bed, lying down lazily for moment, she was exhausted after all, since she cleared a dungeon at your side, then someone shrunk you, leaving her with the responsibility and stress to look after you, and also she walked for a while and had little fight with bandits.

For you when everything calmed down, you started to heard a familiar song far from you, and muffled through the boot and sock, but still very familiar.

"Our hero, our hero claims a warrior's heart, I tell you, I tell you The Dragonborn comes." The bard sings far away.

You heard enough you where in a inn and you knew it, you started to lick Serena big toe madly, wanting to get her attention, to make her take you out of your prison.

"Yeah, yeah I know, I was just taking a breath" Serena said clamping her big toe on you preventing you from moving at all.

She took her other boot first, taking as long as possible too, she had developed a pleasure to have you under her sore foot, so she wanted you there as much as possible, but also liked you as friend and maybe something more in the future, not to mention that she was also grateful to you for rescuing her from the dungeon originally, so she didn't want to upset you, she only wanted to enjoy the feeling of you under her foot as much as possible.

Finally she took you from her boot, and sock, she shook the sock contents in her hand, dropping you in her palm.

"At last." You said breathing profusely.

"Hey wasn't that bad, right? Serena asked you interested.

"Maybe but still want to enjoy the fresh air." You said

"Wasn't that bad then huh, then what you say to sleep in my sock through the day, until we can leave again at night." Serena said expecting that you accept her offer.

"I don't know" you decided to...
